title: Squadron Commander
description: Planning and developing training for the Aboriginal Leadership Opportunity Year (ALOY) program. This included teaching core Military subjects such as Leadership, Personal and Time Management, Battle Procedure and Weapons Handling.
name: Chris Hall

title: Joint Training, Readiness, Exercises and Lessons Learned
description: Conducted and monitored Training, Exercises and Personal and Equipment readiness in addition to collecting and disseminating Lessons Learned for Operation ATHENA.
name: Chris Hall

title: Senior Signals Intelligence and Electronic Warfare Analyst and Advisor
description: Provide SIGINT and EW support and advice to the Commander, CFJOG. Responsible for Physical and IT Security, and protection of classified equipment, information and materials. Held these duties and responsibilities for in Canada and deployed Operations such as Operation PALLADIUM, Operation HALO, Operation LION and Operation ATHENA.
name: Chris Hall

title: Senior Analyst, National Defence Operations Centre
description: Provide SIGINT and EW support and advice to the Canadian Forces Intelligence Staff at the National Defence Operations Centre (NDOC). The was an interim appointment prior to taking control of the SIGINT Element for the CFJOG.
name: Chris Hall

title: Long Term Analysis and Reporting Supervisor
description: Analysis and reporting of information not considered immediate. This involved developing a long term view of Foreign agencies activities and intentions. I left this job to take the Operations Supervisor for the Electronic Warfare team on Operation PALLADIUM, July 2000 through March 2001.
name: Chris Hall

title: Principle Technical Trainer
name: Chris Hawthorne
